item.description:
Note: This event requires a reservation and it may or may not require a deposit by the organizer so all cancellations within 48 hours of the event requires a reason. Please do not sign up unless you are sure that you can make it.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The membership has voted! The July Restaurant of the month is Restaurant Adria.

About the Restaurant of the Month:

Authentic, simple elegance - best describes our restaurant and the Mediterranean cuisine we offer to Nashua and the Boston region. Family owned and operated, Executive Head Chef Slavica's recipes originate from the areas surrounding the Mediterranean Sea and offer a new, intriguing & indulgent casual dining place.

Authentic in style and preparation, simple yet overflowing in flavour, each appetizer, entr√©e and dessert has been carefully selected for your dining pleasure. Come, explore a variety of traditional Mediterranean specialties that include veal, poultry, beef, seafood & vegetarian dishes, made fresh and from the finest ingredients.

To those of you who, for months, have been wondering about us behind the papered windows, "Thank You" for your patience. Join us soon for lunch or dinner. Our family looks forward to serving you!
